Posts.Content: Nov 21, 2010 09:33AM sunshine922 wrote: I am so sorry to hear about your mother.  I just found out myself about bc this week.   It is nothing like your mother's though.  I can understand how your mother wants you to just go on without her.   She is probably in too much pain to travel if her back has been hurting her too.  God Bless you.
